Texts.Chs: 我们都知道神是居住于天空之上的，是至高无上的，但是克鲁西斯仅仅是个有血有肉的生物，并且他的历史并没有存在很多年。我一直被长老们指控为异端，到处东躲西藏，但是我一定要找出其背后的真相。
Texts.Eng: I have heard of other species whose gods are celestial. Kluex, however, is flesh and blood. And yet, he has not been seen for many, many years. I will discover why. I will uncover the secret behind the Kluex deception. But also flee for my life.

Texts.Chs: 我终于逃脱了他们的捕抓，但我还有更重大的使命。我正在试图证明克鲁西斯只是虚构的，如果我办到了，所有被欺骗的翼族人将会重获自由。
Texts.Eng: While it is the case that I may have escaped for my own self-preservation, it is important I do not forget my larger mission also. Kluex is not real. I will prove it. If I can do this, I can free my people.
